root.name: ALF
root.description: Title screen. ALF is a Sega Master System game based off the 80's American sitcom that ran from 1986 to 1990. In it you play as ALF as he tries to rebuild his space ship and go to Mars to visit his friends Rhonda and Skip. You travel through ALF's neighborhood, the ocean, and even to the moon collecting and buying parts for your space ship. Along the way the Alien Task Force will try and apprehend you and if they do so the game is over.
